patrilex
Class Constants

java.lang.Object
  patrilex.Constants

public class Constants
extends java.lang.Object

Main class for managing the resources of the Patrilex search engine

Constructor Detail

Constants

public Constants(java.lang.String location,
                 java.lang.String user,
                 java.lang.String password)
Global constants that are set in initialization and used throughout the program. This constructor is for use without a file with DB access information.

Global constants that are set in initialization and used throughout the program.

setValue

private void setValue(java.lang.String field,
                      java.lang.String value)
Method setValue Sets the value of the constant 'field' to 'value'. A value is not inserted if it contains the character ".

getValue

private java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String field)
Method getValue Returns the value of the field with name of the parameter. If the field is not found "" is returned.

initialize

public void initialize()
Method initialize Creates the constants table. If the table already exists, nothing is done.

getConstantsList

public java.sql.ResultSet getConstantsList()
Method getConstantsList Returns a list of all entries of the constants table (wich may not contain any entries, in this case the void ResultSet is returned). Returns null in case of error.

writeDBFile

public java.lang.Boolean writeDBFile(java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String user,
                                     java.lang.String password)
Method writeDBFile Writes a new location, user and password combination to the file for the database information.

tableExists

private java.lang.Boolean tableExists()
Method tableExists Returns true if the table exists, else false.

stringToInt

private int stringToInt(java.lang.String input)
Method stringToInt Converts a String to an Integer. If it is no number, 0 is returned.
